Method Detail

parseLSAs

public final Set<LSA> parseLSAs(String input)
                         throws SAPEREException
Description copied from interface: LSAParser

Parses the provided String in order to create a bunch of LSAs.

Input format should be TURTLE.

Specified by:
parseLSAs in interface LSAParser
Parameters:
input - A String representation of LSAs in the form of RDF/XML, Turtle or N-Triples.
Returns:
All parsed LSAs
Throws:
SAPEREException - Cannot complete creation due to some model constraints violation or invalid parameters

public final Set<LSA> parseLSAs(String input,
                                RDFFormat type)
                         throws SAPEREException
Description copied from interface: LSAParser

Parses the provided String in order to create a bunch of LSAs.

Supported formats are:

  • RDF/XML
  • Turtle
  • N-Triples

Specified by:
parseLSAs in interface LSAParser

input - A String representation of LSAs in the form of RDF/XML, Turtle or N-Triples.
